statements: DELETE FROM sensitive_data_changes WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sensitive_data_changes WHERE timestamp < '2021-01-01' AND user_id = 100
DELETE FROM access_controls WHERE user_id = 100 AND access_level = 'admin'
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND action = 'DELETE';
DELETE FROM access_controls WHERE user_id = 100 AND access_level > 5;
DELETE FROM password_history WHERE user_id = 5 AND timestamp < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
